Key Match Events: Gui Santos made four of his six 3-point attempts in the game.
Buddy Hield hit five of his 11 three-point attempts in a spot start.
Steph Curry had an off night, finishing 5-of-21 overall and 2-of-14 on 3s.
Gui Santos contributed with scrap rebounds, sneaky steals, transition hustle, and loose-ball wins.
Post-Match Reflections: Warriors coach Steve Kerr emphasized the importance of defense, rebounding, hustle, and sprinting in winning games.
Steve Kerr reflected on the team's previous loss to the Miami Heat, noting the lack of hustle and sharp passes as key issues.
Steve Kerr praised Gui Santos for winning many small battles during the game, which contributed to the victory.
